main-title: The best European products for your business!
main-subtitle: A wide range of food products and household chemicals, as well as competitive prices - the best conditions for regular customers
stat-2: years of successful work on the Ukrainian market
c-descr: EuroPrice is your reliable partner for the supply of high-quality European food products and household chemicals. Our assortment includes more than 1,000 products of appropriate quality and safety. We offer fast delivery in Ukraine through leading partners in this field - Nova Poshta and Delivery. Contact us and we will provide you with a personalized service at attractive prices.
distribution-text: We don't just sell products, we partner with the best companies to ensure the quality and distinction of our products.
list-2: Competitive prices for high quality products
list-3: Fast and reliable delivery across Ukraine
list-5: An individual approach to each client
feedbacks-descr: Your feedback is our greatest reward and motivation for further development and improvement of our services!
feedback-1-subtitle: EuroPrice is a very good company, a large assortment, friendly prices, everything is sent quickly, I have been working for a long time and very satisfied, the customers are too)
feedback-2-subtitle: I am very glad that I found the EuroPrice company. A good assortment, you always go to meet your customers, with you all issues are resolved quickly and on time.
feedback-3-subtitle: I ordered a product from you, everything arrived great! Packaging, quality and delivery class! I recommend you to friends! Talapa Vasyl, a very good person, always understands what customers need)
